Comments_List:
Identifying patterns of wrappings on mummies, in order to date them to a particular period

Writing skills for possible published papers

Research using library and other systems

Death and Burial rituals and traditions in Egypt

Experimental mummification

Presentation and speaking in public

Meeting more often in the week.

But otherwise the course was fantastic, with excellent skills and knowledge imparted to students. Salima ikram will benefit this program greatly and she needs to be brought here permanently.

YES!

But only if taught by Dr. Ikram. She really cares about her students doing well, and about the department which would greatly benefit from her being here.

She was fun, and facilitated efficient and easy learning with a lot more incentive to do well. she also offered to publish a paper written by us, so had our future interests in mind.
